users.name: Adrian Garcia
users.content: The human body was designed by a civil engineer. Who else would run a toxic waste pipeline through a recreational area?

users.name: Pepito Perez
users.content: I like to wax my legs and stick the hair on my back. Why? Because it keeps my back warm. There's method in my madness.

users.name: Armando Paredes Icasas
users.content: I told my wife the truth. I told her I was seeing a psychiatrist. Then she told me the truth: that she was seeing a psychiatrist, two plumbers, and a bartender.

users.name: Rafael Nieto de Dios
users.content: If I could I would. Wether or not I should, I still would.

users.name: Juan Macho Seco
users.content: Sometimes I wonder if I really can. But then I think to myself, maybe I can't. But if I could, that would be good. Maybe it's all a lie?
